ClauseNo.Description: 44ABa-Clause 44AB(a)- Total sales/turnover/gross receipts of business exceeding specified limits; 44ABAA-Clause 44AB(a)- Proviso where aggregate cash receipts and cash payments of business exceeding specified limits; 44ABb-Clause 44AB(b)- Gross receipts of profession exceeding specified limits; 44ABci-Clause 44AB(c)-i- Profits and gains lower than deemed profit u/s 44AE; 44ABcii-Clause 44AB(c)-iii- Profits and gains lower than deemed profit u/s 44BBB; 44ABd-Clause 44AB(d)- Profits and gains lower than deemed profit u/s 44ADA; 44ABe-Clause 44AB(e)- When provisions of section 44AD(4) are applicable; 44AB3-Third Proviso to sec 44AB : Audited under any other law; 44ABciii-Clause 44AB(c)-iii- Profits and gains lower than deemed profit u/s 44BBB

UnderSec92CE.description:
01-(i) has been made suo motu by the assessee in his return of income
02-(ii) made by the Assessing Officer has been accepted by the assessee
03-(iii) is determined by an advance pricing agreement entered into by the assessee under section 92CC
04-(iv) is made as per the safe harbour rules framed under section 92CB or
05-(v) is arising as a result of resolution of an assessment by way of the mutual agreement procedure under an agreement entered into under section 90 or section 90A for avoidance of double taxation

NatureImpermissible.Description: a-creates rights, or obligations, which are not ordinarily created between persons dealing at arm's length; b-results, directly or indirectly, in the misuse, or abuse, of the provisions of this Act; c-lacks commercial substance or is deemed to lack commercial substance under section 97, in whole or in part or; d-is entered into, or carried out, by means, or in a manner, which are not ordinarily employed for bona fide purposes.; e-others

ObservationsCode.description: 01- Proper books of account, to enable reporting in form 3CD, have not been maintained by the assessee.;02- All the information and explanations which to the best of my/our knowledge and belief were necessary for the purpose of my/our audit has not been provided by the assess;03- Documents necessary to verify the reportable transaction were not made available.;04- Proper stock records are not maintained by the assessee.;05- Valuation of closing stock is not possible.;06- Yield/percentage of wastage is not ascertainable.;07- Records necessary to verify personal nature of expenses not maintained by the assessee.;08- TDS returns could not be verified with the books of account.;09- Records produced for verification of payments through account payee cheque were not sufficient;10- Amount of expense related to exempt income u/s 14A of Income-tax Act, 1961 could not be ascertained;11- Creditors under Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises Development Act, 2006 are not ascertainable;12- Prior period expenses are not ascertainable from books of account.;13- Fair market value of shares u/s56 (2) (viia)/(viib) is not ascertainable;14- Reports of audits carried by Excise/Service tax Department were not made available;15- GP ratio is not ascertainable from the financial statements prepared by the assessee.;16- Information regarding demand raised or refund issued during the previous year under any tax laws other than Income-tax Act, 1961 and Wealth tax Act, 1957 was not made available.;17- Others
